review: Overall, I think this is an ok product. I own the Roku, Roku 2, and Chromecast. I no longer use the Roku and only use this and the Chromecast. I was looking for something that has a remote so I can watch Netflix, Hulu, etc, without me downloading a bunch of apps like the Chromecast. The issue I have with this is that the stream quality is very bad compare to Chromecast. With the Chromecast, once you stream it, it almost flawless with very little to no lag. With the Amazon Fire TV, There is always a lag or buffering issue.Chromecast advantage over this: Better stream quality, can stream anything from your web browser. Work flawlessly with Youtube and Netflix.Chromecast disadvantage over this: Requires a phone/laptop/ etc to cast. Need to download individual apps, if you want to stream it from your phone or tablet.
